txt_en: Trust is the key to any relationship.
txt_cn: 信任是相处的基石。

txt_en: There's a future worth fighting for.
txt_cn: 未来值得我们为之奋斗。

txt_en: We are always stronger together.
txt_cn: 团结力量大。

txt_en: Brothers and sisters are as close as hands and feet.
txt_cn: 手足情深。

txt_en: Love comes in at the eyes.
txt_cn: 爱只需一个眼神就能体会。

txt_en: Discovery requires experimentation.
txt_cn: 不断实验才能有所发现。

txt_en: Every day is a chance to learn something new.
txt_cn: 每天都是学习新事物的好时机。

txt_en: It's autumn time.
txt_cn: 秋天到了。

txt_en: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
txt_cn: 经历过痛苦的离别，才知晓爱意的深远。

txt_en: Every life matters.
txt_cn: 每个生命都弥足珍贵。

txt_en: We gotta try.
txt_cn: 我们总得试试看。

txt_en: Love is always there if you just open yourself to it.
txt_cn: 如果你敞开心扉，就能发现爱从未走远。

txt_en: We cannot allow fear to drive us from our purpose.
txt_cn: 我们不能因恐惧而背离初心。

txt_en: If you want the rainbow, you have to deal with the rain.
txt_cn: 不经历风雨，怎能见彩虹。

txt_en: Be grateful for what you got.
txt_cn: 要感激你所拥有的一切。

txt_en: Will is the source of your strength.
txt_cn: 意志力是力量之源。

txt_en: They say when you meet the love of your life, time stops.
txt_cn: 人们说，当你遇到挚爱时，连时间也会停止。

txt_en: Childhood doesn't last.
txt_cn: 童年转瞬即逝。

txt_en: In nature, everything is linked.
txt_cn: 自然万物，息息相关。

txt_en: Do not live by somebody else's rules. Live by your own.
txt_cn: 别被他人的规矩束缚，要用自己的方式生活。

txt_en: The price of excellence is eternal vigilance.
txt_cn: 欲为人杰，必先警醒。

txt_en: You can't love someone without making yourself open to their problems, their fears.
txt_cn: 爱一个人，就是敞开怀抱，拥抱他的困窘和恐惧。

txt_en: Summer soon gives way to autumn, and the nights start getting longer again.
txt_cn: 夏秋更迭，夜色渐长。

txt_en: A man gets what he earns, when he earns it.
txt_cn: 能力决定收益。

txt_en: Go, live your dream.
txt_cn: 去吧，去实现你的梦想。

txt_en: You are better than you think you are.
txt_cn: 你比自己想象中更优秀。
